name: Rising Halo
description:
Welcome to Rising Halo!

Unfortunately, you have been separated from your angel. In order to find them, you must make your way back to the heavens by any means necessary. 

The goal of Rising Halo is to climb as far as possible in the clouds. The higher you climb, the better your score.

CONTROLS:
Jump: Space

**This game was made for MiniJam 70: Heaven**
